00021 extern std::map<std::string, std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> > gAnalysedPulseMap;

00023 CoincidenceCut::CoincidenceCut(char *HistogramDirectoryName, std::string det_name_a, std::string det_name_b, double start_window, double stop_window) :
00024   FillHistBase(HistogramDirectoryName){ 
00025 
00026   fDetNameA = det_name_a;
00027   fDetNameB = det_name_b;
00028   fStartWindow = start_window;
00029   fStopWindow = stop_window;
00030   dir->cd("/");
00031 }
00032 
00033 CoincidenceCut::~CoincidenceCut(){  
00034 }
00035 
00036 int CoincidenceCut::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00037   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00038   typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00039   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00040 
00041   // Get the detA pulses ready for later
00042   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> detA_pulses = gAnalysedPulseMap[fDetNameA];
00043   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>& detB_pulses = gAnalysedPulseMap[fDetNameB];
00044   
00045 
00046   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator currentDetAPulse = detA_pulses.begin(); // want to keep track of how far we are through the detA pulses
00047 
00048   // Loop through the detB pulses
00049   for (std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator detBPulseIter = detB_pulses.begin(); detBPulseIter != detB_pulses.end(); ++detBPulseIter) {
00050 
00051     // Loop through the detA pulses
00052     bool coinc_found = false;
00053     for (std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator detAPulseIter = currentDetAPulse; detAPulseIter != detA_pulses.end(); ++detAPulseIter) {
00054 
00055       double detB_time = (*detBPulseIter)->GetTime();
00056       double detA_time = (*detAPulseIter)->GetTime();
00057       double t_diff = detB_time - detA_time;
00058 
00059       if (t_diff > fStartWindow && t_diff < fStopWindow) { // if within the window
00060         coinc_found = true;
00061         break; // no need to go through the detA pulses any more
00062       }
00063       // We should be time-order here and so if we go past the time for this pulse without finding a match we can quit
00064       if (detA_time > detB_time) {
00065         coinc_found = false;
00066         break;
00067       }
00068       currentDetAPulse = detAPulseIter; // record where we are up to 
00069     } // end loop through detA pulses
00070 
00071       // If no coincidence was found
00072     if (coinc_found == false) {
00073       delete *detBPulseIter;
00074       detB_pulses.erase(detBPulseIter);
00075       --detBPulseIter;
00076     }
00077 
00078   } // end loop through detB pulses
00079 
00080   return 0;
00081 }
